com.pump.image.transition

Class BlindsTransition2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.transition.AbstractTransition
      • com.pump.image.transition.Transition2D
        • com.pump.image.transition.BlindsTransition2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition

    public class BlindsTransition2D
extends Transition2D
    Also known as "Venetian Blinds", this creates several horizontal/vertical strips that grow in width/height respectively to reveal the new frame. Here are playback samples:

    Blinds Left (4)

    Blinds Left (10)

    Blinds Left (20)

    Blinds Right (10)

    Blinds Up (10)

    Blinds Down (10)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.pump.image.transition.Transition

        BIG, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT, CLOCKWISE, COUNTER_CLOCKWISE, DOWN, HORIZONTAL, IN, LEFT, MEDIUM, OUT, RIGHT, SMALL, TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, UP, VERTICAL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlindsTransition2D()
      Creates a BlindsTransition2D that moves to the right with 10 blinds.

      Creates a BlindsTransition2D.

        public BlindsTransition2D(int type)

        type - must be LEFT, RIGHT, UP or DOWN.

      • BlindsTransition2D

        public BlindsTransition2D(int type,
                          int numberOfBlinds)
        Creates a BlindsTransition2D.
        Parameters:
        type - must be LEFT, RIGHT, UP or DOWN
        numberOfBlinds - the number of blinds. Must be 4 or greater.

    • Method Detail

      • getDemoTransitions

        public static Transition[] getDemoTransitions()
        This public static method is used by the com.bric.image.transition.Transition2DDemoHelper class to create sample animations of this transition.
        Returns:
        the transitions that should be used to demonstrate this transition.

      • getInstructions

        public Transition2DInstruction[] getInstructions(float progress,
                                                 java.awt.Dimension size)
        Description copied from class: Transition2D
        This determines how to transition from A to B.
        Specified by:
        getInstructions in class Transition2D
        Parameters:
        progress - a float from [0,1]. When this is zero, these instructions should render the initial frame. When this is one, these instructions should render the final frame.
